attributes.background: On behalf of the Indian Christian Concern, I would like to raise our grave concerns regarding the Christian Persecution in the state of Orissa, India. The Christian Community is very concerned about the destruction and damage to Churches, Christian houses, orphanages, schools and loss of innocent lives.reconversion of christians by force by extreamist
